headline: Buy 5 Nuclear Energy Stocks Amid Massive AI-Powered Data Center Growth
summary: AI-driven data center demand is fueling a nuclear energy boom. D, DUK, AEE, ETR and PCG are five stocks poised to benefit from the surge.
